message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will greatly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its high value and unique features, I estimate its worth to be around $15000 to me. Considering its significance to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14000. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a premium discount. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
